languages.text: An the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble chooses his prey, applying the game for the feast effect on them. Creatures with this effect suffer +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: An the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble chooses his prey, applying the game for the feast effect on them. Creatures with this effect suffer +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes this effect.

An the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble chooses his prey, applying the game for the feast effect on them. Creatures with this effect suffer +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes this effect.

An the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble chooses his {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, applying the game for the feast effect on them. Creatures with this effect suffer +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes this effect.

languages.text: その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時に、腐敗した貴族は自分が狩る獲物を選び、その獲物に対して饗宴の狩猟動物の獲物する。この効果を受けた生物は、貴族の攻撃から受ける{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+50%増加する。貴族がターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}合、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}10%{/g}が回復し、この効果は解除される。
languages.original_text: An the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble chooses his prey, applying the game for the feast effect on them. Creatures with this effect suffer +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: そのターン終了時に、堕落した貴族は自分が狩る獲物を選び、その獲物に対して狩猟動物の効果を適用する。この効果を受けた生物は貴族の優先ターゲットとなり、貴族の攻撃から受けるダメージは＋50％増加する。貴族がターゲットに命中した場合、傷は10％回復し、この効果は解除される。

その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時に、腐敗した貴族は自分が狩る{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}を選び、その獲物に対して饗宴の狩猟動物の獲物する。この効果を受けた生物は、貴族の攻撃から受ける{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+50%増加する。貴族がターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}合、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}10%{/g}が回復し、この効果は解除される。

languages.text: 腐化贵族{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，会选择一名猎物，对其施加“盛宴猎物”效果。腐化贵族对此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%。如果腐化贵族{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}了目标，则会恢复10%的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，并移除此效果。
languages.original_text: An the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble chooses his prey, applying the game for the feast effect on them. Creatures with this effect suffer +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: 腐化贵族{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，会选择一名猎物，对其施加“盛宴猎物”{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}效果{/g}。腐化贵族对此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%。如果腐化贵族{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}了目标，则会恢复10%的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，并移除此效果。

腐化贵族{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，会选择一名猎物，对其施加“盛宴猎物”{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}效果{/g}。腐化贵族对此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%。如果腐化贵族{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}了目标，则会恢复10%的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，并移除此效果。

languages.text: Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el noble corrupto elige a su presa, aplicándole el efecto Presa para el festín. Las criaturas con este efecto se convierten en objetivo prioritario para el noble y reciben un +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional de sus ataques. Si el noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al objetivo, recupera un 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y quita el efecto.
languages.original_text: An the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble chooses his prey, applying the game for the feast effect on them. Creatures with this effect suffer +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el noble corrupto elige a su {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}, aplicándole el efecto Presa para el festín. Las criaturas con este efecto se convierten en objetivo prioritario para el noble y reciben un +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional de sus ataques. Si el noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al objetivo, recupera un 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y quita el efecto.

languages.text: Am Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} wählt der verdorbene Adlige seine Beute aus und wendet den Effekt "Wild auf das Festmahl" auf sie an. Kreaturen mit diesem Effekt erleiden +50 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch die Angriffe des Adligen. Wenn der Adlige sein Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erhält er +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zurück und entfernt diesen Effekt.
languages.original_text: An the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble chooses his prey, applying the game for the feast effect on them. Creatures with this effect suffer +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: Am Ende seines Zuges wählt der verdorbene Adlige seine Beute aus und wendet den Effekt Wild für das Festmahl auf sie an. Kreaturen mit diesem Effekt werden für den Adligen zum Prioritätsziel und erleiden +50 % mehr Schaden durch seine Angriffe. Wenn der Adlige sein Ziel trifft, erhält er 10 % Wunden zurück und entfernt diesen Effekt.

Am Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} wählt der verdorbene Adlige seine Beute aus und wendet den Effekt "Wild auf das Festmahl" auf sie an. Kreaturen mit diesem Effekt erleiden +50 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch die Angriffe des Adligen. Wenn der Adlige sein Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erhält er +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zurück und entfernt diesen Effekt.

languages.text: À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le noble corrompu choisit sa proie et lui applique l'effet Du Gibier pour le Festin. Ses attaques infligent alors +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires à la créature ainsi marquée. Si le noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} sa cible, il récupère +10% de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et dissipe cet effet.

If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes this effect.

À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le noble corrompu choisit sa {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g} et lui applique l'effet Du Gibier pour le Festin. Ses attaques infligent alors +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires à la créature ainsi marquée. Si le noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} sa cible, il récupère +10% de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et dissipe cet effet.

languages.text: В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} оскверненный дворянин выбирает жертву и накладывает на нее эффект "дичь для пиршества". Существо, получившее этот эффект, получает на 50% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от атак дворянина. Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по этой цели, дворянин восстанавливает себе 10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, после чего эффект снимается.
languages.original_text: An the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble chooses his prey, applying the game for the feast effect on them. Creatures with this effect suffer +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: В конце своего хода оскверненный дворянин выбирает добычу и накладывает на нее эффект "дичь для пиршества". Существо, получившее этот эффект, становится приоритетной целью для дворянина и получает на 50% больше урона от его атак. Совершив попадание по этой цели, дворянин восстанавливает себе 10% здоровья, после чего эффект снимается.

В конце своего хода оскверненный дворянин выбирает добычу и накладывает на нее эффект "дичь для пиршества". Существо, получившее этот эффект, становится приоритетной целью для дворянина и получает на 50% больше урона от его атак. Совершив попадание по этой цели, дворянин восстанавливает себе 10% здоровья, после чего эффект снимается.

languages.text: Yoz soylu, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda avını seçerek onda ziyafet şikârı etkisi oluşturur. Bu etkiye maruz kalan yaratıklar, soylunun saldırılarından +%50 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alırlar. Soylu, hedefine {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurursa{/g} +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı tazelenir ve bu etki de ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: An the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble chooses his prey, applying the game for the feast effect on them. Creatures with this effect suffer +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes this effect.
